version_description:
Heads up, giffy lovers! A new update of GifYou has finally arrived.
We’ve fixed a few minor bugs to make the app run smoothly.
Did we miss something? Come on! Tell us what you think of this update in the comments section.

Ciao Users!
All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Anything new, you’d ask?
Well, not much to be honest, just a few bug fixes that (hopefully) will result in performance improvement.
Keep calm and make new GIFs. Talk to you soon!

Hi there! All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Anything new, you’d ask? Well, not much to be honest, just a few bug fixes that (hopefully) will result in performance improvement.
Take care, talk to you soon!

Ciao Users! All good on your side?
We are doing great as well, thanks!
Anything new, you’d ask?
Well, not much to be honest, just a few bug fixes that will result in performance improvement.
Take care, talk to you soon!

Happy Valentine's Day, GIF lovers!
All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
In this update we add categorization. Now all GIFs are divided into categories.
Also, we’ve listened to your feedback and fixed a couple of issues, that popped up in our latest update - thanks for your help!
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to review our app on the App Store!
Make new GIFs and remember that we love you! <3

Hi there, GIFs lovers! All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Anything new, you’d ask? Well, yes!
First, now it's easy to post GIFs to Instagram and TikTok as 1-2-3. So if you want to share your dope memes or top stickers with your friends - do it.
Second, you can easily save all faces of your friends just in the app, to add their faces in GIFs faster and troll your buddies.
Also, we've fixed a few bugs that (hopefully) will result in performance improvement.
Be a part of our gang and make new memes!

Hi there!
In this update we've improved all our categories, now all GIFs are better sorted.
Also, we’ve listened to your feedback and fixed a couple of issues, that popped up in our latest update - thanks for your help!
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to review our app on the App Store!
Make new memes and remember that we love you!

Thank you for staying with us, GIFs lovers!
Here’s what’s new:
- Private Gallery: now all your favorite GIFs will be stored in one place
- Prank Your Friends: now you can create funny GIFs with friends' faces from your contact list.
Also, we’ve listened to your feedback and fixed a couple of issues, that popped up in our latest update - thanks for your help!
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to say how you like new GIFs on the App Store.
Make new memes and prank your buddies!

Thank you for staying with us, GIFs lovers!
All good on your side? We are doing great as well, thanks!
Here’s what’s new:
– Updated User Interface (UI): provides a more modern and streamlined user experience
– Smart tips on how to find the best GIF to prank your friends
– Bug fixes and performance improvements
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to say how you like new GIFs on the App Store.
Make new memes and prank your buddies!

Thank you for staying with us, GIFs lovers!

Hi there! You're our best friend, so we want to tell you our little secret.
Sometimes we perform magic. For example, we fix bugs in such a way that you don't even notice anything, like with this version.
So keep calm, make new memes, and prank your buddies!

Hey, GIF lovers!
Anything new, you’d ask?
Yes! Now we have a birthday reminder! It means you'll never forget to wish your buddies a happy b-day. Just put their face in a dope meme, and the best greeting card is ready!
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to review our app on the App Store!
Take care, talk to you soon!

Hi there! You're our best friend, so we want to tell you our little secret.
Sometimes we perform magic. For example, we fix bugs in such a way that you don't even notice anything, like with this version.
So keep calm, make new memes, and prank your buddies!

Thank you for staying with us, GIF lovers!
Here’s what’s new:
- Easy swipe: now you can easily swipe between GIFs in preview mode until you find the meme you like
Also, we’ve listened to your feedback and fixed a couple of issues, that popped up in our latest update - thanks for your help!
We would appreciate it if you can spare just a moment to say how you like new GIFs on the App Store.
Make new memes and prank your buddies!
